title: Result​
content: </> type Result = ( key: string, value: number ) An object containing the key and value of a score.

title: new​
content: </> ScoreSync.new(Config: { Name: string, UTC: number?, Type: ("Highest" | "Lowest")?, Cycle: ("All-Time" | "Yearly" | "Quarterly" | "Monthly" | "Daily" | "Hourly")?, Refresh: number?, BatchOverrides: { Size: number?, Delay: number? }? }) → ScoreSync Creates a new ScoreSync object. Name (string): The name of the leaderboard. UTC (number, optional): The UTC offset for the leaderboard. Type (string, optional): The type of leaderboard (Highest or Lowest). Cycle (string, optional): The cycle of the leaderboard (All-Time, Yearly, Quarterly, Monthly, Weekly, Daily, Hourly). 'Refresh' (number, optional): The refresh rate of the leaderboard. BatchOverrides (table, optional): The batch overrides for the leaderboard. Size (number, optional): The number of requests to process at once. Defaults to 20 Delay (number, optional): The delay between each batch. Defaults to 30

title: IncrementAsync​
content: </> ScoreSync:IncrementAsync( Player: Player , Amount: number? ) → Promise<boolean>

title: SetAsync​
content: </> ScoreSync:SetAsync( Player: Player , Amount: number ) → Promise<boolean>

title: GetOrderedListAsync​
content: </> ScoreSync:GetOrderedListAsync( Count: number?, Min: number?, Max: number? ) → Promise<{Result}>
